title: Monstress, Volume 7: Devourer
description: Humans and Arcanics are at war once again, but battles of the heart and soul are the most dangerous of all. Caught in the calculating grip of the Dusk Court, Maika and Zinn uncover painful secrets of the past while Tuya fights to preserve her futureâ€”and young Kippa might be the Known World's only hope for the present.Collects MONSTRESS #36-41
author: Marjorie M. Liu
